json.text:
Who are you - The answer - Step 1 - You are
a creator

In this video we are explore why you are a
creator and how to successfully create what
you desire in life.

You do not live every day to find exactly
what life has in store for you, but you are

creating your reality every minute, most likely
without you recognising the process.

let’s look into it for a moment what is
the process, and how we do it.

First and foremost.
The Scripture tells us that God have created

you, me, anyone who has ever lived in the
image and likeness of God. If you believe

in God then you know that. But if you say
I do not believe in God. that is only rubbish

I only believe on what science prove to be
fact so then let me tell you what science

says. According to sciences We really ARE
made of stardust - The same building blocks

of life found at birth of new stars. So the
cosmos is also within us. this has nothing
to do with religion. So put aside.

So now we agree so then
"What does it mean that you, me are made in

the image and likeness of God or we are as
same as stars”

2. God is the creator. Or stars create themselves.
3. We are three beings in one. How you call

them doesn’t matter: the important thing
is that we are: mind, body, and spirit; or

superconscious, conscious, subconscious; Father,
Son, and Holy Ghost;

4. Creation is a made at these three levels
and the tools of creation are: thought, word,

and action.
5. All creation begins with thought. Then

moves to word. And then fulfilled by action.
6. That which you think of, but still not

speak it, has been already creates at one
level thought. Then that which you think of

and speak it. It is also creates at another
level Word. That which you think, speak, and

take action it manifest in our reality our
experiences.

7. To think, speak, and do something which
you do not truly believe is impossible. Therefore,

the process of creation must include belief.
This is absolute faith. This is beyond merely

doing and hoping. This is knowing of a certainty.
Therefore, the doing part of creation always

includes an absolute belief. A total certainty,
a complete acceptance as reality of something

that it is.
8. This place of belief is a place of intense

and incredible gratitude. It is been thankful
in advance. And that, is the biggest key to

creation: to be grateful before, and for,
the creation. Such taking for granted is not

only condoned, but encouraged. It is the sure
sign of mastery. It is to know for certainty

that your ask is granted as soon you have
put it out there.

9. Celebrate and enjoy all that you create,
have created, your life, your experience.

To reject any part of it is to reject a part
of yourself. Whatever it is now part of your

experiencing is part of your creation, own
it, claim it, bless it, be thankful for it.

Seek not to condemn it, for to condemn it
is to condemn yourself.

10. If there is some aspect of creation you
find you do not enjoy, bless it and simply

change it. Choose again. Call forth a new
reality. Think a new thought. Say a new word.

Do a new thing. Do this magnificently and
the rest of the world will follow you. Call

for it. Say, “I am the Life and the Way,
follow me.”

This is how to manifest God’s will “on
Earth as it is in Heaven.”

You might say I have tried everything possible
that can be in the book of law of nature.

Law of attraction, meditation, affirmation,
prayers you name it why my life still has
took off?

Doing something doesn’t mean you are doing
it right. Working hard doesn’t mean you

will get result. Working hard and smart that
is the difference.

How can you create something when you are
not even sure of what to create. The truth

is that we create every minutes of our life
not knowing that we are doing it.

Because we are created in the image and likeness
of God so therefore we have the power to create.

So you will create the things you want in
your life as soon you become very clear in

your thinking about what is that you desire.
Think about what you want to be, do, and have.

Think about it often until you are very clear
about this. Then, when you are very clear,

think about nothing else. Picture no other
possibilities. Burn all your bridge to go

back.
Throw all the things that block you, all negative

thoughts out of your mental constructions.
Direct your mental compass toward positivity.

Create a positive mental attitude. Lose all
negativity. Release all doubts. Reject all

fears. Discipline your mind to hold fast to
the original creative thought.

When your ideas are clear and unfaltering,
then move to the second facet of creation.

Start to speak them as facts. Speak them out
loud. Use the great command that calls forth

the power of creation: I am. Make I-am statements
to others. “I am” is the strongest creative

statement in the universe. I am created in
the image and likeness of God therefore I

have the power to create. Whatever you think,
whatever you speak, after the words “I am”

sets into motion those experiences, calls
them forth, brings them to you.

There is no other way the universe knows how
to work. There is no other route it knows

to take. The universe responds to “I am”
as you would call somebody with their name.

They will recognise it is them and they will
come to you.

I know it is easy said than done. Yes you
would say just look around, just look at the

state of world how can you hold steadfast
a positive thought for that long.

Let me tell you this.
Make use of your thoughts, working out how

to control them, is not as tough as it may
appear. It is all a matter of discipline.

It is a question of intent.
The first step is learning to monitor your

thoughts; to think about what you are thinking
about.

When you catch yourself thinking negative
thoughts—thoughts that negate your highest

idea about a thing—think again! I want you
to do this, literally. If you think you are

in a gloomy situation, and no good can come
of this, think again. If you think the world

is a bad place, filled with negative events,
think again. If you think your life is falling

apart, and it looks as if you’ll never get
it back together again, think again.
You can train yourself to do this.

The choice is yours and will aways be. Because
you are a creator.

If you found this video useful. Give me a
thumb up. If you have anything add agreeing

or disagreeing use the comment box below.
If you have a question you want us to explore

say it in the comment box below.
If that is your first time here and you have

yet to subscribe then press the subscribe
button and
the little bell next to it.

God bless you.
See you next.
